settings.label: Total needed for free shipping
settings.info: Amount in cents

settings.content: Third-party apps and add-ons can sometimes require a full page refresh. If your app is not displaying properly, select Sport mode.

settings.label: Main menu over banner content
settings.info: Applies when the main menu overlaps a wide display banner and does not have a solid background

settings.label: Enable styled tables
settings.info: This will add borders and padding to your tables

settings.label: Image
settings.info: 1800 x 1000px recommended

settings.label: Enable solid menu background color
settings.info: This will enable a solid header over the banner images

settings.label: Enable menu background transparency
settings.info: This will make the sticky menu semi-transparent throughout the shop

settings.label: Footer background image
settings.info: 1800 x 600px recommended

settings.label: Custom Text
settings.info: This text will show up in the product's box on collection pages. Products need to be tagged with 'custom-text'

settings.label: Custom Text Color
settings.info: Choose color of custom text

settings.label: Custom Text URL
settings.info: (works only if modal text is not set)

settings.label: Custom Text Start Date
settings.info: Optional. Leave blank if not used. Please use this format: yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss (2021-09-21 00:00:00)

settings.label: Custom Text End Date
settings.info: Optional. Leave blank if not used. Please use this format: yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss (2021-09-21 23:59:59)

"Back in stock request" form text
settings.default: Notify me when this product is available:

settings.label: Inventory remaining threshold
settings.info: Inventory remaining text will be displayed below this value

settings.content: After enabling reviews you will need to install the free [Shopify Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app.

settings.label: Display star rating on product thumbnails
Show dynamic checkout button
settings.info: Each customer will see their preferred payment method from those available on your store, such as PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

settings.label: Show lock icon on checkout button
Mini cart checkout
settings.info: Proceed to checkout from the mini cart

settings.label: Show "agree to terms" checkbox
settings.info: If the dynamic payment button is enabled, customers will be able to bypass these terms ([?](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/sell-online/online-store/dynamic-checkout))

settings.label: Shipping rates calculator default country selection

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use above, refer to your first checkout page.

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: USD CAD INR GBP AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.label: MailChimp form action URL
settings.info: [Find your MailChimp form action URL](https://help.outofthesandbox.com/hc/en-us/articles/115006912487-Setting-Up-MailChimp-Turbo-)

settings.label: Show newsletter form above footer
settings.info: Home page newsletter can be added as a section.

settings.content: To test the popup feature, set the number of days until the popup is displayed again to Test Mode.
